positions.title: Senior Python Developer
positions.description:
I'm part of backend Python developer And Developed Python based API (Restful Web Service) to get the data using Django with MongoDB and MySQL.
1. Developed the Web Application with Python.
2. Knowledge on Python Frameworks of Django, Flask.
3. Knowledge on the AWS Services of Amazon S3, DynamoDB, IAM User, Lambda function, CloudWatch.
4. Expertise in the Chatbot Development - Python with API, Lex(AWS), apiai.
5. Knowledge on Heroku Deployment.
6. Developed Python based API (Restful Web Service) to get the data using Flask, SQLAlchemy and MySQL.
7. Proficient understanding of code versioning tools (GitHub, Bit Bucket).
…
see more
